products.title: Roland Monochrome Roman Blind
products.description: There's something crisp yet comforting about this roland monochrome roman blind, the soft neutral body perfectly decorated with lustrous silver borders. The contrast between soft cream and shimmering metallics is simply beautiful, unfussy yet full of character and luxury.

products.title: Pavillion, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Keep up with the latest home dcor trends by including the pavillion in grey in your home. The fashionable grey and yellow colour pairing is both stylish and fun, and offers a serene look without compromising on colour. Hang the grey in your home study for a serious yet interesting look and feel. Opt for pale grey walls and accent throughout with charcoal greys and mustard yellows. Frame yellow and grey wall art in black, and go for modern, sleek furniture.

products.title: Woodland, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Look closer and you'll see the artistry required to create each leafy branch as the fabric takes on a life of its own. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Velvet Taupe Roman Blind
products.description: One of william morriss best-known designs, strawberry thief was first created in 1883 and its still an incredibly popular design today. Part of their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, strawberry thief was originally named by morris after the thrushes that one of william morriss best-known designs, strawberry thief was first created in 1883 and its still an incredibly popular design today.

products.title: Selva, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: With its intricately woven stitching in cream, and a contrasting, chenille-like fabric, the selva in graphite is a gorgeously luxurious blind that blends beautifully into the roman curves of the blind. Whilst the blind itself is a classic one, the contrasting cream and slate grey colour combination is contemporary and modern. Add luxe layers of cosiness to your living room by including the graphite to bring warmth and texture to the room.

products.title: Velvet Crush Silver Ice Roman Blind
products.description: Crushed velvet in light, silvery tones - what could be better? This bordered roman blind will create lots of lovely texture for your living space to help make it feel cosy and sumptuous. It's put together in beautiful neutral grey shades. Grey is the height of fashion these days crushed velvet in light, silvery tones - what could be better? This bordered roman blind will create lots of lovely texture for your living space to help make it feel cosy and sumptuous.

products.title: Verve Silver Roman Blind
products.description: If its tonal colour, subtle pattern and the look of absolute luxe youre after then this verve silver roman blind will be right up your street. Taking two of their most popular fabrics and combining them was an easy choice, and doing so has created a fabulous little number, wo if its tonal colour, subtle pattern and the look of absolute luxe youre after then this verve silver roman blind will be right up your street.

products.title: Rocco, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: Deep charcoal grey is home to an angular patterning in homely cream in the sumptuous rocco graphite. The main fabric has a plush chenille-feel texture, whilst the cream detailing is a loosely stitched thread with a soft shimmer. Hang the graphite in a contemporary yet luxurious living room. Match the walls to the detailing with a rich cream, and opt for dark grey carpets and patterned rugs. Include splashes of deep red or pretty plum in the form of cushions and throws for additional character and personality.

products.title: Allure Faux Silk Slate Roman Blind
products.description: The classic contrasting combo, black and white, can be put to good use in schemes both retro or contemporary. Slick and clean, the shimmering faux silk base takes on a metallic tone, broken up by the slubs and other natural touches youd see in real silk. Framing that brigh the classic contrasting combo, black and white, can be put to good use in schemes both retro or contemporary.

products.title: Eclissi Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Talk about sophistication. The eclissi charcoal roman blind is suave, moody and ever so sumptuous thanks to the combination of textured charcoal fabric and gentle grey borders. This blind helps to bring a softer side to a dark colour scheme, whilst the contrasting grey shades talk about sophistication.

products.title: Kent, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Traditional meets contemporary in the kent charcoal, with its classic chenille-like texture and modern lead grey hue. The unity works beautifully though, forming a rich and luxurious roman blind that you won't want to miss out on. Settle the charcoal amongst a monochromatic colour scheme for modern chic in the dining room. Or, if you love a splash of colour, team with a bright teal for a contemporary and striking tonal look, whether in the living room or master bedroom.

products.title: Emilia Embroidered Grey Roman Blind
products.description: If your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss. The delicate blossoms are stitched into a mid grey fabric to create a stunning floral pattern. The flashes of bright white give balance and shade to a if your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss.

products.title: Galileo Faux Silk Silver Roman Blind
products.description: A roman blind is often considered a more traditional choice for window dressing, but this chic little blind proves just how modern and stylish they can be too. products.description: The woven dupion silk with crepes and slubs looks sensational in this grey moonstone colour and is without doubt one of their best value blinds.
